channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: AI検索エンジン「Perplexity」が、フォーブスなどの記事の一部を、ほぼ同じ文言と不十分な帰属表示で「Pages」機能に再掲載している。
item.description:
Forbes:
AI search engine Perplexity is republishing parts of stories by Forbes and others, with nearly identical words and inadequate attribution, on its Pages feature  —  The startup, hailed as an AI-focused Google challenger, is republishing parts of exclusive stories from multiple publications …

item.title: 米デジタル広告訴訟、グーグルは陪審裁判を受けないと判事が判断（Mike Scarcella/Reuters）
item.description:
Mike Scarcella / Reuters:
Judge rules Google will not face jury trial in US digital ads case  —  Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) Google will not face a jury trial over its alleged digital advertising dominance after the company paid $2.3 million to cover the U.S. government's claim of monetary damages, a federal judge ruled on Friday.

item.title: グーグルの広告ビジネスに関する反トラスト法裁判で、陪審員ではなく裁判官が評決を下すことになった。
item.description:
Matthew Barakat / Associated Press:
A judge, not a jury, will give the verdict in the antitrust trial about Google's ad business, after Google paid $2.3M to cover US government's monetary damages  —  A judge rather than a jury will decide whether Google violated federal antitrust laws by building a monopoly on the technology that powers online advertising.

item.title: 情報源TNTスポーツの本拠地であるWBDが、全仏オープンの米国での放映権を10年間6億5000万ドルで獲得、ケーブルネットワークとマックスでの放映を計画（Andrew Marchand/New York Times）
item.description:
Andrew Marchand / New York Times:
Sources: WBD, home of TNT Sports, strikes a $650M deal for US rights to the French Open for 10 years, with plans to air the event on cable networks and Max  —  Warner Bros. Discovery has a 10-year, $650 million deal in place to be the new home of the French Open in the United States beginning in 2025 …

item.title: グーグル、カナディアン・ジャーナリズム・コレクティブと、同社が2023年にカナダのニュース会社に約束した1億カナダドルの分配契約を締結（Mickey Djuric/The Canadian Press）
item.description:
Mickey Djuric / The Canadian Press:
Google signs a deal with The Canadian Journalism Collective to distribute the CA$100M the company has promised to Canadian news companies in 2023  —  Google names group to dole out $100M to news  —  OTTAWA - Google announced which organization it has selected to distribute the $100 million …

item.title: TikTok、CNNとソニーのアカウントがハッキングされた欠陥を修正したことを確認（Sam Sabin/Axios）
item.description:
Sam Sabin / Axios:
TikTok confirms that it has fixed a flaw that let the accounts of CNN and Sony be hacked  —  - TikTok confirmed to Axios that the unidentified hackers were able to take over CNN's account.  — Reports suggest that they also attempted to hijack Paris Hilton's TikTok account.

item.title: 情報筋WBDはNBAに対し、ディズニー、アマゾン、NBCUと並んで、試合権という小さなパッケージを切り分ける「第4のパッケージ」を検討することを望んでいる（Brian Steinberg/Variety）
item.description:
Brian Steinberg / Variety:
Sources: WBD would like the NBA to consider a “fourth package”, which would carve out a small package of games rights, alongside Disney's, Amazon's, and NBCU's  —  The media company has signaled in recent days to the NBA that it would like to discuss the prospect of carving …

item.title: Netflixがライブ配信したボクシングのジェイク・ポール対マイク・タイソン戦は11月15日に再延期（Andreas Hale/ESPN）
item.description:
Andreas Hale / ESPN:
Netflix's livestreamed boxing match between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson is rescheduled for November 15  —  The boxing match between Jake Paul and Mike Tyson has a new date.  —  After the scheduled July 20 clash between the Youtuber-turned-prizefighter and former heavyweight champion …

item.title: ユナイテッド航空がアプリや座席背もたれスクリーンにパーソナライズ広告を表示開始、顧客データを収益化する企業が増えている（Patience Haggin/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Patience Haggin / Wall Street Journal:
United Airlines starts showing personalized ads in its app and on seat-back screens, one of an increasing number of companies monetizing customer data  —  Carrier aims to monetize customer data for advertising purposes  —  United Airlines has begun showing personalized ads on its planes' seat-back screens …

item.title: トナカイの赤ちゃん」のマーサ役のインスピレーションの源だと主張する女性、ネットフリックスを相手に1億7000万ドルの名誉毀損訴訟を起こす（Upmanyu Trivedi/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Upmanyu Trivedi / Bloomberg:
A woman who claims to be the inspiration for the Martha character on Baby Reindeer files a $170M defamation lawsuit against Netflix  —  - Californian suit says show outed her and ruined her life  — Netflix says it'll defend the $170 million claim vigorously

item.title: NYTやロイターなどの組合員記者の一部は、組織化費用や組合幹部の左寄りのジャーナリズム批判をめぐり、ニューズギルドを批判している（マックス・タニ/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Some unionized journalists at the NYT, Reuters, and others criticize the NewsGuild over organizing costs and union leaders' left-leaning criticism of journalism  —  The Scoop  —  A top news union's organizing costs and some of its leaders' outspoken left-leaning criticism of journalism …

item.title: オレゴン州のファースト・パンプリン・メディアが南部の新聞チェーンに売却、12タイトルを発行するEOメディアは5紙を閉鎖し、会社を売りに出す（Brier Dudley/The Seattle Times）
item.description:
Brier Dudley / The Seattle Times:
Oregon's First Pamplin Media sells to a Southern newspaper chain, and EO Media, which publishes 12 titles, closes five papers and puts up the company for sale  —  A one-two punch this week is knocking out much of Oregon's remaining local newspaper ownership.

item.title: ウィル・ルイス、電話ハッキング事件との関連記事をもみ消そうとしたとの報道を批判し、デイビッド・フォルケンフリックをジャーナリストではなく活動家と呼ぶ（Washington Post紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Will Lewis criticizes reports that he tried to suppress stories on his ties to a phone hacking case and calls David Folkenflik an activist, not a journalist  —  In a statement Thursday, William Lewis pushes back at media outlets' accounts of events leading up to Post editor Sally Buzbee's abrupt departure on Sunday.

item.title: NetflixはTVアプリでホームページのデザイン変更をテストしており、番組や映画を表示する静的なタイルを、リモコンがその上に乗ると伸びるボックスに置き換えている（Emma Roth/The Verge）。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Netflix is testing a homepage redesign on its TV app, replacing static tiles showing shows and movies with boxes that extend when the remote lands on them  —  Netflix is testing a big homepage redesign on its TV app.  The new look replaces the static tiles containing the shows and movies …

item.title: アレックス・ジョーンズは、破産法第7条に基づき、サンディフック事件の遺族に支払うために個人資産を清算することに同意した。
item.description:

Alex Jones agrees to liquidate his personal assets to pay Sandy Hook families under Chapter 7 bankruptcy, in a move that could end his ownership of Infowars  —  Right-wing conspiracy theorist Alex Jones on Thursday moved to liquidate his personal assets, agreeing to demands from the families …
